intro: Dipterospermum, commonly known as the African snowball, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Apocynaceae. It is characterized by its woody stems and showy, clustered flowers that often appear white or pink. The plants typically grow in tropical and subtropical regions, particularly in Africa. They have opposite or whorled leaves and produce蓇葖 fruits. Dipterospermum species are often used in traditional medicine for their purported medicinal properties.
